name: places/ChIJHUnYGuZZwokR9D4-w-bF8cs
formattedAddress: 690 Washington St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 690 Washington St, New York, NY 10014-2534, USA

originalText.text: Lynne Samone Mazin is an exceptional luxury real estate advisor in NYC. She worked with my family and we achieved success! The apartment was staged beautifully to maximize our value. 20 buyers came to the first open house and the apartment was sold in 45 days. I strongly recommend partnering with Lynne Samone for all your real estate needs. You will love her as much as we do ❤️

text.text: Lynne Samone Mazin is an exceptional luxury real estate advisor in NYC. She worked with my family and we achieved success! The apartment was staged beautifully to maximize our value. 20 buyers came to the first open house and the apartment was sold in 45 days. I strongly recommend partnering with Lynne Samone for all your real estate needs. You will love her as much as we do ❤️

originalText.text:
In my nearly 15 years in the business, I rarely come across an agent as knowledgable, resourceful and dedicated as Lynne. I actually don't even like calling her an agent as she is so much more than that. Lynne is a consummate professional who provides expert advisory services for the Luxury Market (including off-market) in the Real Estate capital of the world.

Lynne's active listening, her dedication, and her unwavering loyalty to all of whom she works with is unmatched. This is why Lynne is able to leverage her powerful relationships (with developers, agents, clients, etc) to bring even the most complicated deals successfully across the finish line. Lastly, despite her calm and pleasant demeanor I would not want to be on the opposite side of a negotiation with her.

originalText.text: Lynne is a true expert and professional in her field who is also well connected giving her the ability to solve for any scenario that may arise during your sale. Her financial acumen, her ability to quickly solve problems, find solutions, and navigate obstacles, makes her your one stop shop and a must have as your Real Estate professional. I have worked with Lynne on a variety of deals and she never disappoints.

originalText.text: Lynne is the absolute best. Her wealth of knowledge is unmatched and her achievements in the luxury real estate market really speak for themselves. I’ve never met someone who knows NYC like she does. Not to mention, she knows how to make the whole process enjoyable! If I ever need to buy or sell an home again, I know who I’m calling.

text.text: Lynne is the absolute best. Her wealth of knowledge is unmatched and her achievements in the luxury real estate market really speak for themselves. I’ve never met someone who knows NYC like she does. Not to mention, she knows how to make the whole process enjoyable! If I ever need to buy or sell an home again, I know who I’m calling.

originalText.text:
For over a decade, I've had the privilege of knowing and working with  Lynne Mazin, and I can confidently say she's not just a real estate agent, she's a trusted advisor and confidante in the world of luxury property. Her expertise extends far beyond mere transactions; she possesses a comprehensive understanding of finance, legalities, and the nuanced requirements of discerning clients ( or OCD clients like me ! )

What truly sets Lynne apart is her dedication to providing a holistic, client-centric experience. She doesn't simply sell properties; she listens intently to your needs, understands your aspirations, and then meticulously tailors a strategy to achieve them. Whether you're a seasoned investor looking for the perfect trophy asset or a first-time buyer navigating the complexities of the market (like I was) , Lynne will be your champion every step of the way.

Her trustworthiness is beyond reproach. In a field where integrity can be rare, Lynne stands out as a beacon of honesty and ethical conduct. You can rest assured that your best interests are always her top priority.

If you're seeking the most bespoke and credible professional for your luxury real estate endeavors, look no further than Lynne Mazin. She's a rare gem – a consummate professional with unparalleled knowledge, unwavering dedication, and unwavering loyalty. Take my word for it, entrusting your next luxury real estate experience to Lynne will be one of the wisest decisions you'll ever make. She is the only one I go for my real estate needs.
